content:
josh lamb said:

I have not seen this mentioned yet here: https://1up.health/virtual-health-conference/schedule (Grahame Grieve is speaking so I am sure he knows about it).

Free registration here

Wow yes, star studded event hosted by 1up.health - free, all day Wednesday ET. Speakers include

  • The CMS Rule: Alexandra Mugge of CMS
  • The ONC rule: @Keith Boone
  • @Ricky Sahu
  • @Wayne Kubick
  • @Rien Wertheim
  • @James Agnew
  • @Jocelyn Keegan
  • @Hans Buitendijk
  • @Aneesh Chopra
  • @Lenel James
  • @Ryan Howells
  • moi
    And many more not on this chat - - Chuck Jaffe, Don Rucker, Deven McGraw, Kristen Valdes, more.
@Dave deBronkart I've tried to register but the illusive confirmatory email has never arrived (not in spam either.) Anyone else having issues?

Robert McClure said:

Dave deBronkart I've tried to register but the illusive confirmatory email has never arrived (not in spam either.) Anyone else having issues?

@Ricky Sahu will have to help. Personally I've found chaos with both of the hastily assembled "virtual HIMSS event replacement" things I'm involved with - this one and HealthDevJam Friday afternoon. (For the latter I discovered I got combined with someone else, simply because I stumbled on the published agenda.)

If I had to guess I'd say there IS no confirming email. The YouTube Live URLs are already in the agenda but not clickable - I'd say just show up and try. Or watch the archive later.

Given the monstrous cost of cancelling HIMSS (I won't be surprised if the total bill runs to $100M), I figure these travails are sort of like being a flea on a dog that managed to get onto a lifeboat from a sinking ship. Seriously.
And moi, reading the rule. There will be SHAKESPEARE
Crowdcast is a better alternative in my opinion. Worked great for the Redox virtual conference yesterday
live here: https://youtu.be/XuJ47lE9GiU
